reviewText: A heartwarming Glee Christmas to share.....there really is Christmas magic!  BELIEVE! It will become your Glee Christmas classic! Heartwarming. Wonderful!
Title: Glee: A Very Glee Christmas

reviewText: loved it, it is definitely glee, if you have the series it is in one of them, but seems nice just to have a separate one to watch around the holidays
Title: Glee: A Very Glee Christmas

reviewText: this a very good glee Christmas movies it made us really enjoy it .you and your family will too. thanks
Title: Glee: A Very Glee Christmas

reviewText: I love this DVD! Even though it's just one episode it's one that I could watch a ton of times! I love glee!
Title: Glee: A Very Glee Christmas

reviewText: If you are a GLEE fan and own each season, why would you rebuy 1 episode already avaialble as part of a season?  (If you don't own the seasons I could see the purchase.)  But otherwise FOX is trying the "Disney Double Dip". Not very cool.
Title: Glee: A Very Glee Christmas
